subtitle: INSTITUTIONAL IDENTITY
introText: Pan Africa Group LLC (PAG) is a Dubai-based cross-border business development and market enablement platform active across the Gulf and East Africa. We connect international partners, regional institutions, and local operators to open and advance real commercial opportunities.

timeline.event: Head office and cross-border coordination base
Regional operating presence and corridor interface
Office presence supporting local market coordination
Active platform across Gulf and East Africa trade corridors

content.title: Flexible Commercial Platform
content.description: PAG does not sit inside one product line or one industry vertical. We operate as a flexible platform that identifies opportunity, aligns stakeholders, and supports delivery through structured collaboration.
content.highlight: Built to connect markets, not sell a single product

content.title: How PAG Creates Value
content.description: We help partners enter markets, structure partnerships, coordinate sourcing pathways, and move opportunities from concept to coordinated action where local context matters.
content.highlight: Entry strategy, alignment, and execution support

content.title: Cross-Border Operating Approach
content.description: Our team works across institutions and operators to keep commercial mandates practical, coordinated, and locally grounded.
content.highlight: Bridge between international ambition and local execution

openingHours: Institutional and Commercial Engagement by Appointment

quote.text: PAG connects the right partners, structures the right pathway, and helps move complex cross-border opportunities forward.
